subject: Getting started with Junit
msgSnippet: I am new to Junit but know Java at intermediate level. Please help me with the best process to setup Junit and start writing test cases. I am more interested
messageBody:
I am new to Junit but know Java at intermediate level. Please help
me with the best process to setup Junit and start writing test cases.
I am more interested in setting up a functional Junit environment which
i can use to write test cases.
Please Note: I am QA tester who wants to do unit testing using Junit.
I have solid background in automation tools and scripts and have
no issue with Java as a language. I have also, understood the Junit
framework with all the class packages it has for running test, my
dilemma is to set up the environment. Thanks!

Appreciate it.

Sal





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
